verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. The <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H8055>joy<s%> in thy <S%H5797>strength<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And in thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%> how <S%H3966>greatly<s%> shall he <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>!
Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> him his <S%H3820>heart<s%>'s <S%H8378>desire<s%>, And hast not <S%H4513>withholden<s%> the <S%H782>request<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%>. <S%H5542>[Selah<s%>]
For thou <S%H6923>meetest<s%> him with the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of <S%H2896>goodness<s%>: Thou <S%H7896>settest<s%> a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of fine <S%H6337>gold<s%> on his <S%H7218>head<s%>.
He <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H5414>thee<s%>, thou gavest it <S%H753>him<s%>, Even length of <S%H3117>days<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
His <S%H3519>glory<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%>: <S%H1935>Honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%> dost thou lay upon <S%H7737>him<s%>.
For thou <S%H7896>makest<s%> him most <S%H1293>blessed<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>: Thou <S%H7896>makest<s%> him <S%H8057>glad<s%> with joy in thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>.
For the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And through the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> he shall not be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.
Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> will find <S%H4672>out<s%> all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>; Thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> will find <S%H4672>out<s%> those that hate <S%H8130>thee<s%>.

Thou wilt <S%H7896>make<s%> them as a <S%H784>fiery<s%> <S%H8574>furnace<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of thine <S%H6440>anger<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will swallow them <S%H1104>up<s%> in his <S%H639>wrath<s%>, And the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall devour <S%H398>them<s%>.
Their <S%H6529>fruit<s%> wilt thou <S%H6>destroy<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And their <S%H2233>seed<s%> from among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.
For they <S%H5186>intended<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H2803>thee<s%>; They conceived a <S%H4209>device<s%> which they are not able to <S%H3201>perform<s%>.
For thou wilt <S%H7896>make<s%> them turn their <S%H7926>back<s%>; Thou wilt make <S%H3559>ready<s%> with thy <S%H4340>bowstrings<s%> against their <S%H6440>face<s%>.
Be thou <S%H7311>exalted<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, in thy <S%H5797>strength<s%>: So will we <S%H7891>sing<s%> and <S%H2167>praise<s%> thy <S%H1369>power<s%>.
